h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
content: Once the boss is dead, you can then visit the Horse Guai and pull the chain on the cart next to him to obtain the spell.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location' and the sub-subsection 'Horse Guai Flaming Mountains Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once the boss is dead, you can then visit the Horse Guai and pull the chain on the cart next to him to obtain the spell.
